tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE migration_patterns (
    animal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    migration_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    migration_season VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    migration_distance DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MigrationRecord (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    migration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (animal_id) REFERENCES Animal(animal_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Location(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ClimateChangeImpact (
    impact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    impact_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    impact_location_id INT NOT NULL,
    impact_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (impact_location_id) REFERENCES Location(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE animals (
  animal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  species VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  migration_pattern VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  climate_impact VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE climate_conditions (
  condition_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  temperature DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  humidity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  precipitation DECIMAL NOT NULL
);
